CmdLine: apk update && apk add --no-cache mysql-client wget unzip bash perl openssh
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apk add --update wget ca-certificates unzip git bash m4 &&     wget -q "https://github.com/andyshinn/alpine-pkg-glibc/releases/download/${GLIBC_VERSION}/glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}.apk" &&     apk add --allow-untrusted glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}.apk &&     wget -q -O /terraform.zip "https://releases.hashicorp.com/terraform/${TERRAFORM_VERSION}/terraform_${TERRAFORM_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip" &&     unzip /terraform.zip -d /bin &&     apk del --purge wget ca-certificates unzip &&     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* /terraform.zip glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}.apk
Commands.Name: run
